price: এইটো যাদু নেকি? নে তোমালোকে দেখা নোপোৱা!
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
